name: Working Memory
description:
In Working Memory, you play as Eunice, an older woman with Alzheimer's disease. While participating in a conversation, you have to spell short, one-word responses to help her remember the words she wants to reply with.

This was made for the LÖVE Jam 2023  (https://itch.io/jam/love2d-jam-2023), but I do not believe I will be able to finish it completely before the games are due. It's my first time using LÖVE (version 11.4) and Lua to develop a game and I bit off more than I could chew it seems . I do however want to finish working on the game after the jam is over to fully complete the idea I had in mind. Made this completely during the jam and everything but the bump library used done by me. My husband came up with the title for me. 

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys to move around
  • Space to drop letters.
  • Escape to close the game window.

Special Thanks to 

kikito for the bump.lua library,

&

my husband, Brian. for coming up with the title that instantly grabbed me.
